paper_abstract: The feedback control problem for the parabolic distributed parameter systems with time-delay is investigated. The system model contains time-delay factors in both the diffusion term and the convection term. By using the Lyapunov functional method, the feedback control law is designed for this system. And a simulation example is presented to illustrate the effectiveness of the proposed method.
paper_title: FEEDBACK CONTROL FOR PARABOLIC DISTRIBUTED PARAMETER SYSTEMS WITH TIME-DELAY
